entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is facing Voldemort in a duel.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The antagonist of the story, who is dueling with Harry.

entities.name: harry potter's mother
entities.description: Harry's mother, who died to protect him in a previous encounter with Voldemort.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is mentioned as someone Harry should show respect for.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Voldemort's followers, who are present in the duel between Harry and Voldemort.

relationships.description: Harry is dueling with Voldemort, as mentioned in the text: 'We bow to each other, Harry... Come, the niceties must be observed.'
Harry is expected to show respect for Dumbledore, as mentioned in the text: 'Dumbledore would like you to show manners... Bow to death, Harry.'
Voldemort is leading his followers, the Death Eaters, as mentioned in the text: 'he was surrounded by Death Eaters...'
